statements: DELETE FROM CivilEngineeringDesignDrawings WHERE project_name = 'Bridge Project';
DELETE FROM CivilEngineeringDesignDrawings WHERE project_name = 'Bridge Construction' AND designer_name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM InfrastructureProjects WHERE project_name = 'Highway Extension';
DELETE FROM InfrastructureProjects WHERE project_location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM design_drawings WHERE project_id IN (SELECT project_id FROM infrastructure_projects WHERE project_location = 'New York');
DELETE FROM InfrastructureProjects WHERE project_id = 100 AND end_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Engineer WHERE engineer_name = 'John Doe';
